item.description:
Come join the Brettl-Hupfers at the Boston Premier for the 2009 Teton Gravity Research Ski and Snowboard film Re:Sesson. We’ll be meeting at 5 PM in the restaurant at the House of Blues for drinks and appetizers before the film and then heading into the theater for the film when the doors open at 6 PM. The first 500 people into the auditorium will get free tickets to Mount Snow!

Re:Session takes viewers beyond the traditional ski and snowboard movie into a revolutionary realm of action sports entertainment. Shot on both film and RED ONE high definition camera technology, Re: Session documents the true wealth of the mountain experience. Follow the crew as they score in one of Alagna, Italy’s deepest seasons on record. Check out forbidden powder in Poland, massive wedges in Colorado, new gap jumps in Utah, and seven weeks of epic riding conditions in Alaska. Re: Session brings the most talented athletes in the sport together into one must-see film.

See the Re:Session movie trailer at www.tetongravity.com.

Tickets:
$20 tickets in advance
Online at - http://www.livenation...
Ski Market Boston -- 617~731~6100
The North Face Store Boston – 617~536~8060

This is a great way to get stoked for ski season this winter and meet a great group of people to ski and snowboard with. The Brettl-Hupfers have a lodge in the Mount Washington Valley that sleeps 53 people and provides a really inexpensive way to get the most days on the slopes this winter. More information on our club can be found here:

www.brettl.org/docs/Brettl-Hupfers_Brochure.pdf

Hope you can make it out and join us,

Mike
